dmca.title: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Ginger Clark [mailto:gclark@WritersHouse.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 14, 2005 11:05 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Merrilee Heifetz
Subject: Copyright infringement



I am writing on behalf of Laurell K. Hamilton-we are her literary agents.
The following link contains a photo of our client in a blue dress:

 

http://xsorbit26.com/users5/someclone/index.php?topic=135.msg16060#msg

 

About a third of the way down the page.  This photo is actually owned by
Locus Magazine, and therefore the poster "someClone" is in violation of
their copyright.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.  I can be reached at this
address:

 

Ginger Clark

Writers House

21 West 26th Street

New York, NY 10010

 

Best,

 

Ginger Clark

Ginger Clark 
gclark@writershouse.com 
(212) 685-2605
